title: 12/14/2020 - HOUR 1 - Steelers, Hurts, Bucs, Browns
itunes:title: 12/14/2020 - HOUR 1 - Steelers, Hurts, Bucs, Browns
description:
The Bills exposed the Steelers last night

Let's calm down on the Jalen Hurts hype

The Bucs looked inconsistent off a bye week

The Browns are not Baker Mayfield's team


Guest: Peter Schrager

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
